body: Hello , my question is When the discount ranks ends?

title: Question of ranks

replies.body: I'm just gonna see if they do a fifty percent discount on New Years, April Fools or Saint Patrick Day.
replies.body_tagged: I'm just gonna see if they do a fifty percent discount on New Years, April Fools or Saint Patrick Day.

replies.body: Seeing as Christmas is one of the biggest holidays for those who celebrate it, and the discount is 25%, I doubt any of those holidays will warrant a discount above 25% off if any discount happened at all...
